scenario_text.value:
I’m scared... I feel so insecure... I can’t
handle everyone else’s trust...

Yes, I do struggle with insecurity. I don’t
think I have what it takes to lead everyone.

But I don’t have to do it all myself. When
I’m struggling, I can rely on my friends.

And by leaning on one another, we all support
each other. That’s my kind of leadership.

You said it, Aoi! And don’t forget you can
rely on me, too!
I rely on you all the time, Labramon!
